what: Model Australian Spatial Data with Ready4
title: Model Australian Spatial Data with Ready4
text: Tools modelling Australia specific geometry spatial attribute data use ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4/). development version aus package made available part process testing documenting package. currently highly unstable yet recommended use. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au). install development version software, run following commands R console:

title: AusACT — AusACT-class
text: Meta data processing ACT population projections.

title: AusACT — AusACT-class
text: a_VicinityLookup (instance VicinityLookup class) crs_nbr_dbl Coordinates reference system number (double vector) write_type_1L_chr Write type (character vector length one) processed_fls_dir_1L_chr Processed files directory (character vector length one) imports_chr Imports (character vector) path_to_seed_sf_1L_chr Path seed simple features object (character vector length one) imports_ls Imports (list) merge_itms_chr Merge items (character vector) raw_fls_dir_1L_chr Raw files directory (character vector length one) pkg_1L_chr Package (character vector length one) overwrite_1L_lgl Overwrite (logical vector length one) write_1L_lgl Write (logical vector length one) dissemination_1L_chr Dissemination (character vector length one)

text: Meta data constructing Headspace Centre geometries.

text: a_VicinityLookup (instance VicinityLookup class) crs_nbr_dbl Coordinates reference system number (double vector) write_type_1L_chr Write type (character vector length one) processed_fls_dir_1L_chr Processed files directory (character vector length one) imports_chr Imports (character vector) path_to_seed_sf_1L_chr Path seed simple features object (character vector length one) imports_ls Imports (list) merge_itms_chr Merge items (character vector) raw_fls_dir_1L_chr Raw files directory (character vector length one) pkg_1L_chr Package (character vector length one) overwrite_1L_lgl Overwrite (logical vector length one) write_1L_lgl Write (logical vector length one) dissemination_1L_chr Dissemination (character vector length one)

what: Add year 2016 to ACT population projection — add_year_2016_to_ACT_ppr
title: Add year 2016 to ACT population projection — add_year_2016_to_ACT_ppr
text: add_year_2016_to_ACT_ppr() Add function updates object adding data object. Specifically, function implements algorithm add year 2016 act population projection. Function argument aus_sa3_ACT_ppr_2018_tb specifies object updated. function called side effects return value.

title: Add year 2016 to ACT population projection — add_year_2016_to_ACT_ppr
Add year 2016 to ACT population projection — add_year_2016_to_ACT_ppr
text: aus_sa3_ACT_ppr_2018_tb Australia Statistical Area 3 ACT population projection 2018 (tibble) aus_sa2_ACT_erp_age_sex_2016_tb Australia Statistical Area 2 ACT Estimatedesident Population age sex 2016 (tibble)

what: aus: Model Australian Spatial Data with Ready4 — aus-package

text: Tools modelling Australia specific geometry spatial attribute data use ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4/). development version aus package made available part process testing documenting package. currently highly unstable yet recommended use. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au).  Tools modelling Australia specific geometry spatial attribute data use ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4/). development version aus package made available part process testing documenting package. currently highly unstable yet recommended use. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au).

title: Get no statistic areas — get_no_stat_areas
text: get_no_stat_areas() Get function retrieves pre-existing data object memory, local file system online repository. Specifically, function implements algorithm get statistic areas. Function argument land_sf specifies look required object. function called side effects return value.
